snippet: Two teams will be selected in each event to represent the United States at the world team championships in Bali, Indonesia, over the last two weeks of September.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during United States senior trials for the world team championships in Bali, Indonesia.
lead_paragraph: Two teams will be selected in each event to represent the United States at the world team championships in Bali, Indonesia, over the last two weeks of September.

headline.main: Women’s and Senior Trials Begin in Orlando
headline.print_headline: Women’s and Senior Trials Begin in Orlando
